attributes.action: compel local authorities to offer reimbursement or compensation for unhonoured services for which we, the public, pay for in good faith
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Week in, week out we are let down in respect of services for which we pay our council tax for.  Given the proposed increases in the local precept over the coming months surely we should be entitled to accountability where the service lets us down.  If a bin collection is missed - we must put up with a full bin until the next collection, we must put our rubbish in a bag next to our bin - but we are not entitled to a refund as these services are not individually accountable.  We pay for these services - if we are let down for services we pay for in good faith, we should be entitled to claim a proportion of what we have paid back.
